original_text: Yet the defenced city shall be desolate, and the habitation forsaken, and left like a wilderness: there shall the calf feed, and there shall he lie down, and consume the branches thereof.
korean_text: 대저 견고한 성읍은 적막하고 거처가 황무하며 버림 받아 광야와 같은즉 송아지가 거기에서 먹고 거기에 누우며 그 나무 가지를 먹어 없이하리라

sentences.original_text: Yet the defenced city shall be desolate
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 요새화된 성은 황폐하게 될 것이며

sentences.original_text: and there shall he lie down
